databaseConfig.sql: SELECT OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OR_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OR_NYUKYO_ITEM_ID , OD_NYUKYO_ITEM.ITEN_NAME , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.NAME , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.BIKOU , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID , MS_TANI.TANI_NAME , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.DATA_NO , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.USER_KEY , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.TS FROM OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM LEFT OUTER JOIN OD_NYUKYO_ITEM ON OD_NYUKYO_ITEM.OR_NYUKYO_ITEM_ID = OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OR_NYUKYO_ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_TANI ON MS_TANI.MS_TANI_ID = OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID

SELECT OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OR_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OR_NYUKYO_ITEM_ID , OD_NYUKYO_ITEM.ITEN_NAME , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.NAME , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.BIKOU , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID , MS_TANI.TANI_NAME , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.DATA_NO , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.TS FROM OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM LEFT OUTER JOIN OD_NYUKYO_ITEM ON OD_NYUKYO_ITEM.OR_NYUKYO_ITEM_ID = OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OR_NYUKYO_ITEM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_TANI ON MS_TANI.MS_TANI_ID = OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID WHERE OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM.OR_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID = :OR_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM_IDD

INSERT INTO OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM ( OR_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID , OR_NYUKYO_ITEM_ID , NAME , BIKOU , MS_TANI_ID , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES ( :OR_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID , :OR_NYUKYO_ITEM_ID , :NAME , :BIKOU , :MS_TANI_ID , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE OD_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM SET OR_NYUKYO_ITEM_ID = :OR_NYUKYO_ITEM_ID , NAME = :NAME , BIKOU = :BIKOU , MS_TANI_ID = :MS_TANI_ID , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE OR_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID = :OR_NYUKYO_SHOUSAI_ITEM_ID AND TS = :TS
